Method Detail

newAccount

boolean newAccount(java.lang.String type,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   float balance)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Create a new account object in the server. if an account already exists with the given name then a new account is not created and stored.

Parameters:
type - must be one of Savings or Checking
name - leading or trailing whitespace is removed
balance - must be non-negative
Returns:
boolean true if the account was created and stored, false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the account type is invalid or the balance is non-negative.

closeAccount

boolean closeAccount(java.lang.String name)
Close an account

Parameters:
name - leading or trailing whitespace is removed
Returns:
boolean true if there was an account with this name and close was successful

getAccount

Account getAccount(java.lang.String name)
Parameters:
name - name of the account
Returns:
Account object or null if not found.

getAllAccounts

java.util.List<Account> getAllAccounts()
Returns:
a list of all Accounts inside the server

getActiveAccounts

java.util.List<Account> getActiveAccounts()
Returns:
a list of Accounts inside the server that are not CLOSED

saveAccounts

void saveAccounts()
                  throws java.io.IOException
Saves the state of the server

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if unable to save the state
